entry.title: zenokit/zeno: Zeno is a zero-dependency, lightweight web framework for TypeScript, designed for maximum simplicity and flexibility. It provides intuitive file-based routing and makes building APIs and web applications straightforward while ensuring high performance.

entry.title: thegreedymaster1234/JavaScript-Email-Protection-JEP: JavaScript Email Protection (JEP) is a simple and lightweight way to keep your email safe from spam bots. Instead of leaving your email exposed in plain HTML (where bots can easily grab it), this script dynamically inserts it using JavaScriptâ€”making it way harder for scrapers to detect.
entry.content: JavaScript Email Protection (JEP) is a simple and lightweight way to keep your email safe from spam bots. Instead of leaving your email exposed in plain HTML (where bots can easily grab it), this script dynamically inserts it using JavaScriptâ€”making it way harder for scrapers to detect.

entry.title: karimz1/imgcompress: a lightweight, Dockerized tool for quick, bulk image optimizationâ€”resizing and converting formats (including iPhone HEIC) into high-quality JPEG or PNG. Use it through a modern Web UI for an easy, fast workflow or leverage its CLI for seamless CI/CD integration.

entry.title: Bhargavxyz738/Lazy-CSS: Lazy CSS is a lightweight, utility-first CSS framework that generates styles on-demand as you use them in your HTML or JSX. It offers a Tailwind-like experience but with a "lazy" approach, minimizing CSS overhead. Supports vanilla JS and React, with easy configuration and a wide range of pre-defined utilities and color palettes.
entry.content: Lazy CSS is a lightweight, utility-first CSS framework that generates styles on-demand as you use them in your HTML or JSX. It offers a Tailwind-like experience but with a "lazy" approach, minimizing CSS overhead. Supports vanilla JS and React, with easy configuration and a wide range of pre-defined utilities and color palettes.

entry.title: Lana-Cambeses/Project0-Dramatic: Dramatic is a lightweight Chrome extension that helps users understand visual or cultural references in movies, anime, and shows. Just highlight a word or phrase, and Subtext provides a quick explanation pulled from curated references or live sources like Wikipedia.
entry.content: Dramatic is a lightweight Chrome extension that helps users understand visual or cultural references in movies, anime, and shows. Just highlight a word or phrase, and Subtext provides a quick explanation pulled from curated references or live sources like Wikipedia.
